description:
Asagi was a http://anidb.net/t2588 [koto player] in Isozuki Forest for the god, Mibu-sama. She became ill with sickness which causes her body to dry up and crumble off.
She left Lord Mibu`s service and with helping aid from her umbrella holder, http://anidb.net/ch10369 [Akagane], she has stayed alive. She possesses http://anidb.net/ch1806 [Natsume] in order to be able to play the koto one more time for Akagane.
Source: Natsume Yuujinchou Wiki
name: Asagi
